questions.question: How many posts can we expect to be made daily?
questions.answer: In order to answer this we simply need to know the number of daily active users (DAU). Let us assume we have 10 million DAU and each DAU makes a single post, we will have 10 million posts a day.
Considering that a posts can contain text, images, and video ,
questions.question: How much storage will be needed to save all the posts for a single day?
